text:
Within 180 days of the effective date of this ordinance, the City and County shall: 
     (a)     Amend its Master Plan, Planning Code, and other relevant plans and codes in a manner consistent with this ordinance;
     (b)     Request and apply for conforming amendments to all applicable state and regional plans and regulations; and
     (c)     Begin preparation of the "Waterfront Land Use Plan" required under Section 
61.2 of this ordinance.
(Added by Proposition H, 11/6/90)
